topics.title: What is React?
content: React is a JavaScript library used for Web and Native UI.
React is component-based, making it easy to use, extend, test, and maintain.
React is modular, making applications lightweight, using less memory and rendering faster.

topics.title: Why use React?
content: React allows developers to build interactive UIs efficiently.
React uses a declarative approach, making the code more predictable and easier to debug.
React is backed by Facebook and has strong community support.
